181.SystemMessage58: Template used: "What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?"; last updated: 2025-10-24 16:24:01.166
181.AgentMessage3: Modern Gents: I'm sorry for the confusion. I already checked, and your free Mini Cushion Studs in Gold were already delivered on Jan 12th. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page

184.AgentMessage2:
GLD: Thank you for the details. I already checked, and your orders are still in process. We process orders in 1-2 business days, and for the express shipping, the delivery time will be 3 business days. 

You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well. I hope this clarifies it.
